name: AceSeller
description: The easiest way to start selling online!
overview:
AceSeller was co-founded by Sandeep Shetty, Jinesh Mehta and Rakesh Pai to help Indian designers, artists and businesses sell their products online.

AceSeller is a hosted ecommerce platform that provides everything you need to start selling online in one easy, affordable solution.

With one simple signup, you can start your own online store, fully customize its design, add your products to it, create product catalogues, choose between various options of accepting payments from your customers (Netbanking, Cash On Delivery, Credit/Debit Cards, Paypal), manage your inventory and keep track of your orders while automatically updating your customers about their orders status.

You can also add your store to your Facebook Page to start selling directly inside Facebook!
